views.markdown:
- Added support for Don't Stop The Party tweak - Fixed an iOS 10 issue causing VoiceChanger to randomly not work. - Added iOS 10 support - Added iOS 9.2 - 9.3.x support
- Added support over Bluetooth devices (car/headset).
- Added floating In-Call UI option.
- Fixed call status changes affecting UI appearance.
- Fixed UI not minimizing when tapping outside it.
- Fixed iOS 5/iOS 6 compatibility.

- Switched to real DSP audio processing rather than altering the sample rate, improved quality.
- Added iOS 9 and iPhone 6S-6S Plus support.
- Added slider to manually set voice pitch.
- Added In-Call UI to change your voice live in a call. You can customise the position (top or bottom of screen)
- Updated with full iOS 8 support
- Added support for iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus
- Added iOS 7 support
- Added iPhone 5S arm64 support
